column1: "label": "Vero ostoista ja maahantuonneista, palveluostoista muista EU-maista",
"formula": "sum(purchase rows where vat_treatment=reverse_charge; use vat_cents, else compute(net*rate_bp/10000))",
"formula": "sum(abs(vat_cents) for sale rows where vat_rate_bp=2550 and vat_treatment!=reverse_charge)",
